sentences.en: A. It makes people act irresponsibly.
sentences.cn: 它使人们做事不负责任.

sentences.en: Don't talk irresponsibly if you don't know the inside story.
sentences.cn: 不知内里的情形不要瞎说.

sentences.en: For that whole group of citizens whose appeals for assistance have been similarly and irresponsibly denigrated.
sentences.cn: 为所有的申诉求助后,被同样不负责任的诋毁的公众.

sentences.en: He had been coming and going , for the past year, so comfortably and irresponsibly.
sentences.cn: 一年来, 他随心所欲,无所顾忌地进进出出.

sentences.en: If a pastor doesn't bring up the cohabitation issue, they're acting irresponsibly.
sentences.cn: 如果牧师不提出同居问题，那么他们的行为可能会很不负责任。

sentences.en: In fact, I found him personally likable, if irresponsibly impulsive.
sentences.cn: 说实在的, 我发现,这个人还很可爱, 虽然有些不负责任地过于任性了.

sentences.en: Irresponsibly distort the news content for some political purpose.
sentences.cn: 为了某种政治目的擅自修改新闻内容.

sentences.en: Listens to her rumbling irresponsibly to be really interesting!
sentences.cn: 听她咕噜咕噜的乱说一通实在很有趣!

sentences.en: Liu Ye: Where has, you irresponsibly!
sentences.cn: 刘烨: 哪有, 你乱说!

sentences.en: Programme-makers seem irresponsibly insouciant about churning out violence.
sentences.cn: 编程者似乎对大批量制造含暴力因素的产品处之漠然，毫无责任心。

words.tran_cn: 不可抵抗的；不能压制的；极为诱人的
